Description: NPA or Area Code

NPA in service (Yes/No)

Special annotation for services accomodated by this NPA

Description of the area served by the NPA
Planning Letter containing a map of the NPA
Yes or 'blank'

Predominant dialing pattern on Home NPA Local Calls (7D - seven digits; 10D - ten digits)

Predominant dialing pattern on Foreign NPA Local Calls (7D - seven digits; 10D - ten digits; 1+7D - one plus seven digits; 1+10D - one plus ten digits)
Predominant dialing pattern on Foreign NPA Toll Calls (7D - seven digits; 10D - ten digits; 1+7D - one plus seven digits; 1+10D - one plus ten digits)
Permissive dialing pattern on Home NPA Local Calls (7D - seven digits; 10D - ten digits)
Permissive dialing pattern on Home NPA Toll Calls (7D - seven digits; 10D - ten digits; 1+7D - one plus seven digits)
